budgetMater.AddBudget_PartType: Select Part Type from the dropdown.
budgetMater.AddBudget_PartNumber: Select Part No. (Revision No.) from the dropdown.
budgetMater.AddBudget_checkbox: Check the checkbox to see the current price.
budgetMater.AddBudget_Add: For adding Condition costing, please add a drawer.
budgetMater.AddBudget_Cancel: Click here to cancel and go back to the budget listing.
budgetMater.AddBudget_Save: Click here to send the form for approval.
